attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition signed by the people of the United Kingdom to declare that we want to pass a vote of no confidence in David Cameron.

We oppose
- Trying to privatize the NHS
- Fracking
- Millions of people going hungry every day
- Corporations that get away without paying tax that amounts to £120 BILLION pounds.
- Minimum wage doesn't match the price of inflation
- Bedroom Tax but no mansion tax
- Lack of control over the boarders
- Your off shore bank accounts
- Spying on the general public
- 90,000 children will go homeless this Christmas
- Allegations of protecting a hidden Pedophile ring in parliament that you refuse to investigate

These are a few reasons. The page will not let me put any more. We the general public want David Cameron out of office before the general election.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: Vote of no confidence Primeminister David Cameron

Created by: Paul Preston

Closing: 30/03/2015
